arts.ttl: Jonathan Burkardt and Mainz bursting to make big Bundesliga impression
arts.sum: The fresh Germany international striker is fit again and on course for a fine season as captain of an impressive Mainz outfit - as his goal in the 3-1 win over Dortmund showed. The emphatic way with which Jonathan Burkardt met Danny da Costa's ball from the right flank and slammed past Alexander Meyer in Mainz's 3-1 win over Borussia Dortmund almost seemed routine for a striker that had recently earned his first Germany caps and moved to joint-third in the Bundesliga top scorers' race .

arts.ttl: Post-Match Reaction: Borussia Dortmund’s Poor Away Form Continues Against Mainz
arts.sum: Unfortunately for Dortmund, club captain Emre Can had a different idea of how this game should go and earned a red card following a boneheaded challenge on Mainz’s Lee Jae-Sung. Sahin tried to chop and change Borussia Dortmund’s structure, but his side never looked threatening—the hosts built on their lead in the 54th minute through a well-worked goal finished by Paul Nebel.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund struggling to shake off away blues
arts.sum: Last term's UEFA Champions League finalists boast an incredible 100 percent record afer five league games at home in front of their famed Yellow Wall in 2024/25, yet they have not taken a single away win so far in the Bundesliga and have lost a miserable six matches in a row on their travels in all competitions. In between that pair of Bundesliga away defeats came an unfortunate rematch of last season's Champions League final at Real Madrid .

arts.ttl: Ten-man Dortmund slump to 3-1 loss at Mainz
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund slumped to a 3-1 loss at Mainz 05 on Saturday, a fourth consecutive defeat on the road in the Bundesliga this season which left them seventh in the standings.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund make joint-worst start to a season in 10 years
arts.sum: After a 3-1 defeat against Mainz on Saturday afternoon, Borussia Dortmund suffered their joint-worst start to a Bundesliga season in 10 years. Their 16 points after 10 games is equal…

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Borussia Dortmund Lose 3-1 to Mainz as Away Woes Continue
arts.sum: He continually pressed throughout the match, and his stealing the ball created the play, leading to Dortmund’s penalty. Borussia Dortmund traveled to Mainz today to face a team who had not yet won a match in their home stadium this season.

arts.ttl: Maginficent Mainz add to Dortmund's away blues
arts.sum: Mainz capitalised on Emre Can's early dismissal to claim their first home win of the season with a dominant showing that extends Dortmund's poor away run, which now stretches to four losses in a row on their travels. Jae-sung Lee rises high to head home Mainz's opening goal, giving them a deserved lead - Alex Grimm

arts.ttl: Barcelona 'hatch swap deal plan' to beat Chelsea to Karim Adeyemi transfer next summer
arts.sum: Barcelona could offer Spanish attacker Ferran Torres to Borussia Dortmund as part of a potential deal for Karim Adeyemi, according to a report.

arts.ttl: Match Thread: Borussia Dortmund Head to Mainz in Search of Points
arts.sum: Streaming: ESPN+ (USA) and Sky Go (Germany) Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund predicted XI vs Mainz 05: Nuri Şahin to avoid risk taking
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund will continue to be without several key players as they look to win successive games in the Bundesliga heading into the international break. Ahead of today’s game against…
